Question: Quantcast Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Quantcast Corporation

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Quantcast announced a new AI-driven audience insights platform at CES 2024.
- The platform offers real-time data and analytics to help marketers understand consumer behavior and make informed decisions.
- It leverages machine learning and AI to provide detailed audience insights and predictive modeling.
- The platform aims to help businesses optimize their advertising strategies and improve campaign performance.
